Factsheet

Developer:
Fractal Phase
Based in Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Release date:
itch.io Alpha: January 2014
Steam Early Access: July 31, 2015
PC/Mac/Linux: August 24th, 2017
Nintendo Switch: April 2018
Xbox one: January 2020
Platforms:
Steam
itch.io
Website:
skyroguegame.com
Regular Price:
USD $19.99

Description

Sky Rogue is a fwooshy rogue-lite action flight simulator! Blow things up over land, sea, and air, on an infinite number of procedurally-generated islands. Go toe-to-toe with enemy aces or assault giant flying aircraft carriers, but watch out for volleys of missiles; when you die, you're dead.

History

Development started in July 2013. The original version of the game was made in one week for onegameamonth.com, and was released on itch.io in January 2014.

  • It's bloody great!
    Daniel Hardcastle, NerdCubed

About Fractal Phase

Boilerplate
Founded in 2015, Fractal Phase is a small family-owned independent game company based in Toronto, Canada. We make low poly games for underserved niche markets. We are the creators of Sky Rogue, a low-poly arcade flight simulator on the Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PC.
